appetizers.name: Onion Rings
appetizers.description: 8 onion rings served with marinara sauce or honey mustard.

appetizers.name: Cheese Sticks
appetizers.description: 6 mozarella sticks served with a sauce of your choice.

cold sandwiches.name: Club Sandwich
cold sandwiches.description: the sandwich is split into 4 pieces, served with the vegetables on the side.

cold sandwiches.name: Tuna Sandwich
cold sandwiches.description: a 4 in piece of wheat french bread filled with a tuna fish sauce.

hot sandwiches.name: Chimi Beef
hot sandwiches.description: 4 in white bread with very well cooked beef, melted cheese and pressed in a sandwich maker.

hot sandwiches.name: Turkey meatballs
hot sandwiches.description: Pita bread filled with turkey and meatballs.

drinks.name: Pink Lemonade
drinks.description: 12 Oz. of lemon juice served in 3 Oz of ice with a slice of lemon.

drinks.name: Tropical Punch
drinks.description: 10 Oz, of tropical punch juice serverd in 3 Oz of ice with pieces of fruit.
